cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with the problem of testing monotonicity of halfspaces, which is a fundamental problem in computational complexity and learning theory. The paper uses adaptive algorithms to achieve an exponential improvement in the query complexity of monotonicity testing for halfspaces. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.CC (Computational Complexity), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics).
